original_text: And of the hundred talents of silver were cast the sockets of the sanctuary, and the sockets of the vail; an hundred sockets of the hundred talents, a talent for a socket.
korean_text: 은 백 달란트로 성소의 받침과 휘장 문의 기둥 받침을 모두 백 개를 부어 만들었으니 각 받침마다 한 달란트씩 모두 백 달란트요

sentences.original_text: And of the hundred talents of silver
were cast the sockets of the sanctuary
and the sockets of the vail
an hundred sockets of the hundred talents
